==== /a.tsx (0 errors) ====
    declare const React: any;
    
    const t1 = <div {...<span />} />;
    const t2 = <div {...<span className="foo" />} />;
    const t3 = <Comp
        right={<div>x</div>}
        {...{ wrong: <div>x</div>}}
    />;
    const t4 = <Comp
        right={<div>x</div>}
        {...{ wrong() { return <div>x</div>; }}}
    />;
    const t5 = <Comp
        right={<div>x</div>}
        {...{ get wrong() { return <div>x</div>; }}}
    />;
    const t6 = <Comp
        right={<div>x</div>}
        {...{ set wrong(s) { let a = <div>x</div>; }}}
    />;
